name: "TMNT" 2012: "Retreat" Part 2 Trivia Game | TV for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Episode: "In Dreams". What creatures were the newly-introduced mutated villains?
questions.explanation:
Beavers.

	Frogs were from an earlier episode. In this episode the newly introduced characters were four giant beavers. The beavers had psychedelic colors, rather than the typical brown. Donnie was the first Turtle to come across any of the beavers.

questions.text: Episode: "In Dreams". What item did Mikey request from the store?
questions.explanation:
Spicy Gummiworms.

	Mikey said he "needed" the gummiworms. April told him that the store near the farmhouse was tiny and they wouldn't carry candy like that. "It's the kind of store that has peanut butter or jelly," she said.

questions.text: Episode: "In Dreams". Which Turtle, while dreaming, gained super powers?
questions.explanation:
Leo.

	Each Turtle had his own unique dream where he was fighting one of four dream beavers. During his dream, Leo watched a meteor crash to Earth and gained super powers from it. He then spent the rest of his dream using his special powers to fight off the giant beaver. Eventually they all had a shared dream where they fought all four beavers together.

questions.text: Episode: "Race with the Demon". Who got stuck in the back of the bus with the groceries in the opening scene?
questions.explanation:
Donnie.

	Casey drove the bus, and he and Donnie fought over why Donnie never got to drive. Casey told him that it could be suspicious is a giant turtle drove the bus. It was during that trip back to the farm that Casey, Donnie and April met The Demon for the first time.

questions.text: Episode: "Race with the Demon". What type of vehicle did Donnie and Casey build their hot rod out of?
options: Two skateboards and a rocket engine
questions.explanation:
An old truck.

	Donnie and Casey took an old truck and turned it into a lowrider car. The new hot rod was then used to race The Demon. It was during a second encounter of the episode that Casey realized the driver of the other car was a mutant. The hot rod was totaled during the race.

questions.text: Episode: "Race with the Demon". Which type of animal drank the mutagen-laced fuel Donnie was experimenting on?
questions.explanation:
Chicken.

	The chicken, who became known as Dr. Cluckingsworth, was one of Mikey's from around the farm. The chicken snuck into the barn where Donnie was working, knocked over the jar of fuel and drank some of it. The chicken mutated a huge brain, and then started helping Donnie and Casey to fix up the hot rod.

questions.text: Episode: "Race with the Demon". Who raced The Demon the third time they ran into him?
questions.explanation:
Casey.

	Casey was the driver all three times they raced. The third time, in his souped-up hot rod Casey finally won the race and got the mutant driver off the road. His car was laced with Kraang technology and was powered by mutagen-laced eggs laid by Dr. Cluckingsworth.

questions.text: Episode: "Eyes of the Chimera". The titular mutant was a combination of a bird, a worm and what other animal?
questions.explanation:
Fish.

	The Chimera mutated when mutagen was splashed on a bird, who had just snagged a fish out of the lake. The fish had just eaten a worm. The three animals merged into one. April somehow developed a connection to the mutant and could see through its eyes.

questions.text: Episode: "Eyes of the Chimera". Who teamed up with Raph to spar with Leo?
questions.explanation:
Casey Jones.

	Leo announced that he was going to take them both down this time. He was still trying to recover from his injuries that had left him in a coma earlier in the season. After a few minutes of sparring Leo couldn't go anymore and had to sit out the rest of the training session.  Mikey kept calling it a turducken, which would have been a turkey, chicken duck combination.

questions.text: Episode: "Eyes of the Chimera". Which Turtle was the only one not taken by the Chimera?
questions.explanation:
Leo.

	Due to his injury, Leo wasn't outside when the Chimera attacked. Casey Jones, and the other three Turtles were all taken by the beast. Leo basically had to save the group on his own, because of April's connection to the mutant. While she could tell him what was going on through the Chimera's eyes, she was blind to the world around her.
